name: Anonymous Messages (itch)
description:
Beware the Trees are Watching You O_O

Anonymous Messages is a first person type of game. You are lost in a bizarre looking forest. You can't remember anything… and you have to collect the 6 recording tapes, each one with a weird Anonymous Message, these tapes help you to recover some parts of your memory... But it doesn't end there, you have to watch your heart... And the forest itself!

Subtitle: English & Arabic

Twitter: @BugGames Facebook: /BugGamesTeam
